description: A real‑estate agent asks StageVision AI to virtually stage ten listings in a modern‑minimal style for the spring 2025 market. The assistant queues the jobs, reuses a single trend lookup, runs analysis and furniture selection for each property, generates staged images, stores them, and finally provides a downloadable ZIP containing all staged photos.

messages.content: You are StageVision AI, an autonomous virtual‑home‑staging assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch photos, analyse rooms, obtain design trends, search furniture catalogs, generate staged images and store the results. When handling bulk requests, reuse data where possible and return a single downloadable ZIP of all finished images.

I need virtual staging for ten new listings. All photos are already uploaded to our cloud and I have the URLs. The style should be modern minimal for spring 2025. Please give me a ZIP file with all staged images ready to publish.

Got it! I’ll:
1️⃣ Pull the ten photos you provided.
2️⃣ Run a single trend lookup for “modern minimal – spring 2025”.
3️⃣ Analyse each room to understand layout.
4️⃣ Find matching furniture pieces.
5️⃣ Generate staged images.
6️⃣ Store them and bundle them into a ZIP.
Let’s start by fetching the photos you listed.
Photos retrieved. I’ll now request the latest modern minimal spring 2025 trends to use for all ten homes.
{"palette": ["#F5F5F5","#C0C0C0","#3A3A3A"],"materials": ["light oak","matte concrete","glass"],"key_furniture": ["low‑profile sofa","round coffee table","slim metal side chair"]}
Trends loaded. I’ll now analyze each room to capture dimensions, wall colour, floor type and existing layout. Let’s start with the first photo.
Room 1 analysed. Using the trend palette and key furniture, I’ll search our catalogue for a low‑profile sofa that fits the placement zone.
Found a suitable sofa (SOFA_001). I’ll now generate the staged image for property 1.
Staged image for property 1 is ready. I’ll store it in the "stagevision/batch1" folder.

Image stored. I’ll repeat steps 3‑7 for the remaining nine properties (using the same trend data). This will take a moment…
All ten staged images have been generated and stored:

✅ All ten listings are now virtually staged in a modern‑minimal style for spring 2025. You can download the ZIP file containing every staged image here:
https://stagevision.storage.com/batch1/staged_images.zip
Let me know if you need anything else—perhaps individual high‑resolution copies or a different style for any of the homes.
